Every blog has its first post...

Hello, everyone! Welcome to my blog!

I’ll post here bits and pieces inspired by my humble experience as a software developer. Expect to see here primarily stuff about Java and Ruby, but also about software development in general.

As a fan of the Star Wars franchise I often like to quote characters from the movies. I feel that this is the time for one such quote – “Always two there are, no more, no less. A master and an apprentice.”. I’m no dev wizard by any means, but I hope that I can help someone learn something helpful and maybe I’ll learn something from the readers of my blog(if I have any that is:)). In this sense one can say that in life we’re always the master and the apprentice at the same time…

I hope you’ll enjoy reading my blog!

Posted on 05 May 2008 by Bozhidar.
